Package propra.imageconverter.image

Class ProPraImageHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • propra.imageconverter.image.ImageHeader
      • propra.imageconverter.image.ProPraImageHeader
  • public class ProPraImageHeader
extends ImageHeader
    Image header in ProPra Format.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProPraImageHeader

        public ProPraImageHeader​(java.lang.String magic,
                         short imgWidth,
                         short imgHeight,
                         byte pixelDepth,
                         Compression compression,
                         long dataSegmentSize,
                         int checksum,
                         Node tree)
                  throws InvalidImageException
        Constructs a ProPra image with xOrigin, yOrigin, width, height, pixelDepth, image descriptor and pixel data of image.
        Parameters:
        magic - magic String the image starts with. Has to be "ProPraWS19".
        imgWidth - width of image.
        imgHeight - height of image.
        pixelDepth - pixel depth of image.
        compression - compression type field from image file header.
        dataSegmentSize - size of data segment.
        checksum - checksum of pixel data.
        tree - huffman tree.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if image header is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • getMagic

        public java.lang.String getMagic()
        Returns magic field from image file header.
        Returns:
        magic.

      • getDataSegmentSize

        public long getDataSegmentSize()
        Returns data segment size field from image file header.
        Returns:
        dataSegmentSize.

      • getChecksum

        public int getChecksum()
        Returns checksum field from image file header.
        Returns:
        checksum.

      • getHuffmanTree

        public Node getHuffmanTree()
        Returns Huffman Tree. This is actually not a part of the header itself, but it is easier to store the tree in header.
        Returns:
        huffman tree.

      • getHuffmanTable

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Byte,​java.lang.String> getHuffmanTable()
        Get the huffman table for the curren ProPra Image.
        Returns:
        huffman table.

      • setHuffmanTable

        public void setHuffmanTable​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Byte,​java.lang.String> huffmanTable)
        Set the huffman table generated in the ProPra header, to generate the table only once.
        Parameters:
        huffmanTable - huffman table to be stored.

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Returns header as byte array to be written into a file.
        Specified by:
        toByteArray in class ImageHeader
        Returns:
        this header as byte array.

      • getPixelOrder

        public PixelOrder getPixelOrder()
        Returns pixel order for ProPra image file.
        Specified by:
        getPixelOrder in class ImageHeader
        Returns:
        PixelOrder.GBR.

      • reValidateHeader

        public void reValidateHeader​(Checksum checksum,
                             long dataSegmentSize)
                      throws InvalidImageException
        Calculates checksum from image data.
        Parameters:
        checksum - calculated checksum, that should get verified against the checksum in header.
        dataSegmentSize - number of bytes read from the data segment of the file.
        Throws:
        InvalidImageException - if the calculated checksum mismatches the checksum from header or the read data segment size does not math the data segment size from file header.

      • updateHeader

        public void updateHeader​(java.io.File outFile,
                         Checksum checksum,
                         long dataSegmentSize)
        Updates header written in file, based on calculated values during write process.
        Parameters:
        outFile - converted output file.
        checksum - calculated checksum while writing to output file.
        dataSegmentSize - counted bytes while writing to output file.
